text: Laurentino "Nito" Cortizo Cohen (;born January 30, 1953) is a Panamanian politician. He was the 38th President of Panama from 2019 to 2024. Cortizo Cohen is the former President of the National Assembly and Minister of Agricultural and Livestock Development. He was also a member of the National Assembly between 1994 and 2004.PALABRAS LLANAS - 50 años de visión y Compromiso (1906-2006) In June 2022, Cortizo was diagnosed with myelodysplastic syndrome. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Panama Category:People from Panama City
title: Laurentino Cortizo
